original_text: The man must bring a male sheep to the door of the Tent of Meeting. It is an offering to the Lord.
korean_text: 그 남자는 그 속건제물 곧 속건제 숫양을 회막 문 여호와께로 끌고 올 것이요

sentences.original_text: The man must bring a male sheep
sentences.korean_translation: 그 남자는 수컷 양을 가져와야 합니다

sentences.original_text: to the door of the Tent of Meeting
It is an offering to the Lord
